rules_text:
When this creature enters the battlefield from your graveyard, attach a Leading Role token to it. [i](If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature is legendary, gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.)[/i]
Sequel {1}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its sequel cost. If you do, it enters with a finality counter and it's a 1/1.)[/i]
